1.0.0.name: Wolf Spectrum
1.0.0.author: Wolf Plugins
1.0.0.description: Spectrogram plugin which supports both log and linear frequency scaling.

1.0.2.name: Wolf Shaper
1.0.2.author: Wolf Plugins
1.0.2.description: Distortion plugin that lets you create your own waveshaping functions using a spline-based graph editor.
1.0.2.changes: - Fix an issue with the Warp parameters.

1.2.1.name: OS-251
1.2.1.author: Tobante Audio
1.2.1.description: JUNO style digital subtractive synthesizer with a simple yet powerful DSP algorithm.

1.0.1.name: Valentine
1.0.1.author: Tote Bag Labs
1.0.1.description: A compressor and distortion processor inspired by the hyper compressed and crushed textures in the seminal Justice record.
1.0.1.changes:
- Increased maximum attack time to 55ms
- Adjusted crush/saturation/clip button spacing

0.4.0.name: modEQ
0.4.0.author: Tobante Audio
0.4.0.description: EQ audio effects plugin with modulation.

2.3.4.name: Odin
2.3.4.author: TheWaveWarden
2.3.4.description: 12-voice polyphonic semi-modular synthesizer. Earth shattering basses, exquisite leads or mad FX, Odin's got them all! Use the classic sound of analog waveforms - or draw your own.

1.3.4.name: Surge XT
1.3.4.author: Surge Synth Team
1.3.4.description: Hybrid synthesizer featuring many synthesis techniques, a great selection of filters, a flexible modulation engine, a smorgasbord of effects, and modern features like MPE and microtuning.
1.3.4.changes:
- Fix a logic error in creating Surge XT folder in new session
- Add 1.3.3 cherry pick list and bump cmakelist version
- Update tempo after patch load and calculate time_data.ppqPos
- Update LFO and Step Seq presets to have the LFO EG enabled

1.3.1.name: Surge XT
1.3.1.author: Surge Synth Team
1.3.1.description: Hybrid synthesizer featuring many synthesis techniques, a great selection of filters, a flexible modulation engine, a smorgasbord of effects, and modern features like MPE and microtuning.
1.3.1.changes:
- Fixed bug with audio
- New feature added

1.2.0.name: Monique
1.2.0.author: Surge Synth Team
1.2.0.description: Monophonic, realtime, subtractive-synthesis bass-and-lead software synthesizer.
1.2.0.changes:
- More docker corrections
- Correct the docker release action
- Add a linux docker build (#138)
- Tweak to release pipeline
- Just bump for pipeline test

1.1.0.name: AVL Drumkits
1.1.0.author: Glen MacArthur
1.1.0.description: 11 percussions instruments (Cajon, Woodblock, Handclap, Fingersnap, Bongos, Maracas, Tambourine, Cowbell, Claves, Waterglass) recorded with 5 velocity layers per piece.

1.1.0.name: AVL Drumkits
1.1.0.author: Glen MacArthur
1.1.0.description: Black Pearl and Red Zepplin drumkits recorded with 5 velocity layers per kit piece.

1.2.3.name: Sfizz
1.2.3.author: SFZTools
1.2.3.description: SFZ parser and synth c++ library, providing AU / LV2 / VST3 plugins and JACK standalone client.
1.2.3.changes:
- Curvecc opcodes on v1 EGs and lotimer/hitimer
- Allow polyphonic aftertouch (cc 130) to respect the note number
- Adjusted the gain compensation on pan stages
- Ensure that voices are cleaned up before being force-reused

1.0.2.name: War Tuba
1.0.2.author: DSmolken
1.0.2.description: Tuba played by Jakub Lewicki (aka Ignacy Woland of the band Ha√±ba).

0.9.24.name: Virtuosity Drums
0.9.24.author: Versilian Studios
0.9.24.description: Contemporary Jazz drum kit library, performed with sticks, recorded at Virtuosity Musical Instruments in Boston, MA.
0.9.24.changes: - Bugfix release for ride and crash cymbal mappings.

1.0.0.name: Splendid Grand Piano
1.0.0.author: Akai
1.0.0.description: Steinway piano with 4 velocity layers.
1.0.0.changes:
- Add Half-pedalling by Peter Eastman
- Add String Resonance simulation created by Peter Eastman
- Cosmetic update
- Optimizing polyphony
- Increase hold and decay time, suggested by Peter Eastman

1.0.0.name: Sam's Sonor
1.0.0.author: Sam Greene
1.0.0.description: Sonor Force 3001 drum kit sampled with 4 velocity levels for each part.

1.0.0.name: Salamander Grand Piano
1.0.0.author: Alexander Holm
1.0.0.description: Yamaha C5, recorded with two AKG c414 disposed in an AB position ~12cm above the strings.

1.0.0.name: Naked Drums
1.0.0.author: Wilkinson Audio
1.0.0.description: Multi-mic drumkit, with 10 round-robins, up to 5 velocity layers and several mic layers (Direct, OH, Close room, Far rooms, Mid-side and Wide OH).

1.0.0.name: jSteelDrum
1.0.0.author: Jeff Learman
1.0.0.description: C Steel Drum (a.k.a. 'steel pan') hand-made in Trinidad.

1.0.0.name: jRhodes3c
1.0.0.author: Jeff Learman
1.0.0.description: 1977 Rhodes Mark I Stage 73 piano.

1.0.1.name: Hungarian Zither
1.0.1.author: DSmolken
1.0.1.description: Hungarian 'prime' zither. A rectangular instrument with over a dozen strings, mostly tuned to G, with two melody courses and the rest as drones.

1.0.0.name: Horse Pulse
1.0.0.author: DSmolken
1.0.0.description: Bass Tagelharpa played pizzicato.

1.0.1.name: Double Bass
1.0.1.author: DSmolken
1.0.1.description: 1958 Otto Rubner double bass played arco and pizzicato with additional miscellaneous noises.

1.0.0.name: Black and Green Guitars
1.0.0.author: DSmolken
1.0.0.description: Black Hofner Club and Green Gretsch Anniversary electric guitars.

1.0.4.name: Bear Sax
1.0.4.author: DSmolken
1.0.4.description: 1926 Conn baritone saxophone including sustained notes and breath noise.

0.7.12.name: Neural Amp Modeler
0.7.12.author: sdatkinson
0.7.12.changes:
- Refactor settings page with IContainerBaseWithNamedChildren
- Display model sample rate on settings page
- Rearrange about info
- Input level calibration
- Output calibration
- Backward-compatible unserialization to v0.7.3
- Add tooltip for output mode

1.4.0.name: Swanky Amp
1.4.0.author: Resonant DSP
1.4.0.description: Tube amplifier simulation DSP plugin which aims to capture the details in the dynamics of tube amplifiers.

2.4.0.name: OPL
2.4.0.author: discoDSP
2.4.0.description: OPL FM synth plugin emulates a digital sound synthesis chip developed by Yamaha in the mid 1980s.

3.5.0.name: OB-Xd
3.5.0.author: discoDSP
3.5.0.description: Recreates the sound and behaviours of the Oberheim OB-X, without the limitations of the original hardware including features such as micro random detuning.
3.5.0.changes:
- Unlock Bi-Directional MIDI Control
- New Unison Voices
- Enhanced Oscillator Features
- Advanced Filter Capabilities
- Refined Attack Envelope Shape
- Oversampling Selection
- MIDI and Preset Bar Enhancements
- LFO Synchronization

4.2.0.name: Tunefish
4.2.0.author: Brain Control
4.2.0.description: Tunefish is a tiny virtual analogue synth that was originally developed  for the 64k intros of the demo group Brain Control.

3.3.2.name: Virtual Playing Orchestra
3.3.2.author: Paul Battersby
3.3.2.description: Orchestral sample library featuring section and solo instruments for woodwinds, brass, strings and percussion.

0.9.0.name: Helm
0.9.0.author: Matt Tytel
0.9.0.description: Polyphonic semi-modular synthesizer with a flexible modulation system.

2.4.0.name: EP-MK1
2.4.0.author: Miguel Moreno
2.4.0.description: Real-time physical model of an Electric Piano.

0.11.1.name: jc303
0.11.1.author: Midilab
0.11.1.description: A bass synthesizer designed to simulate bass guitars. Based on the Roland TB-303 Bass Line.
0.11.1.changes: - Fix issue #21 by reverting back the pull request #9 to the original Open303 render logic for midi notes rendering.

3.2.10.name: Dragonfly Reverb
3.2.10.author: Michael Willis
3.2.10.description: Dragonfly Reverb is a bundle of free audio effect plugins for Linux, MacOS, and Windows.

1.0.0.name: Basic Harmonica
1.0.0.author: michael02022
1.0.0.description: Basic harmonica.

1.0.0.name: Mverb
1.0.0.author: Martin Eastwood
1.0.0.description: Studio quality, open-source reverb. Its release was intended to provide a practical demonstration of Dattorro's figure-of-eight reverb structure and provide the open source community with a high quality reverb.

1.0.2.name: VST2413
1.0.2.author: Keijiro Takahashi
1.0.2.description: FM synthesizer based on YM2413 (OPLL) emulator. YM2413 is well known as low-cost FM sound chip, used on Sega Master System and FM-PAC sound expansion cartridge for MSX. Well-suited for use in 'post 8-bit era style' chiptune music.

1.0.2.name: OPNplug
1.0.2.author: Jean Pierre Cimalando
1.0.2.description: FM synthesizer based on OPL3 and OPN2 sound chip emulations. Synthesis of melodic and percussive instruments, support for dynamic parameterization and automation.
1.0.2.changes:
- English translation of the user manual
- KSL editing behavior to make it linear with regards to attenuation
- Build option to link with system-wide libfmt
- Resource system compatible with unsigned-char targets

1.0.2.name: ADLplug
1.0.2.author: Jean Pierre Cimalando
1.0.2.description: FM synthesizer based on OPL3 and OPN2 sound chip emulations. Synthesis of melodic and percussive instruments, support for dynamic parameterization and automation.
1.0.2.changes:
- English translation of the user manual
- KSL editing behavior to make it linear with regards to attenuation
- Build option to link with system-wide libfmt
- Resource system compatible with unsigned-char targets

1.0.5.name: Regrader
1.0.5.author: Igor Zinken
1.0.5.description: Delay effect in which the repeats degrade in various ways. Delay repeats can be synced to the host tempo and time signature and be fully automated.
1.0.5.changes:
- Version 1.0.5 verified to build using Steinberg SDK version 3.7.10.14
- Note : MacOS Audio Unit supports Intel architecture only. Use the VST variants for ARM support.

1.0.3.name: FogPad
1.0.3.author: Igor Zinken
1.0.3.description: A VST reverb effect in which the reflections can be frozen, filtered, pitch shifted and ultimately disintegrated.
1.0.3.changes:
- Version 1.0.3 verified to build using Steinberg SDK version 3.7.10.14
- Note : MacOS Audio Unit supports Intel architecture only. Use the VST variants for ARM support.

1.3.0.name: SmartGuitarAmp
1.3.0.author: GuitarML
1.3.0.description: Uses a WaveNet model to recreate the sound of real world hardware. Models a small tube amp with a clean/lead channel. Gain and EQ knobs modulate the modeled sound.
1.3.0.changes:
- Added cmake and general best practices updates
- Added installers for Win/Mac/Linux
- Fixed graphics handling
- Removed custom load button to simplify plugin
- Fixed param saving in DAW for saved sessions
- Updated to JUCE 7 and latest Eigen modules

0.9.1.name: OctaSine
0.9.1.author: Joakim Frosteg√•rd
0.9.1.changes:
- Fix GUI issues using the clap in Bitwig
- Fix issue activating operator 2 modulation target from GUI matrix
- Show file save/load dialogs above plugin window macOS
- Save selected patch index (and restore it on load)

1.0.0.name: Upright Piano KW
1.0.0.author: Freepats
1.0.0.description: Kawai upright piano, recorded in a living room using a Zoom H1 portable recorder mounted on a tripod in front of the piano.

1.0.0.name: Synthesizer Percussion
1.0.0.author: Freepats
1.0.0.description: Drumkit sounds commonly used in vintage electronic music made with analog synthesizers.

1.0.0.name: Spanish Classical Guitar
1.0.0.author: Freepats
1.0.0.description: Spanish classical guitar with nylon strings, recorded with an AKG Perception 120 microphone.

1.0.0.name: Hang D Minor
1.0.0.author: Freepats
1.0.0.description: Pitched steel percussion instrument tuned in D minor, recorded using a Zoom H1 portable recorder mounted on a tripod.

1.0.0.name: Glasses Of Water
1.0.0.author: Freepats
1.0.0.description: Musical instrument made with glasses of water, recorded with an AKG Perception 120 microphone.

2.5.9.name: Carla
2.5.9.author: Filipe Coelho
2.5.9.description: Audio plugin host, with support for many audio drivers and plugin formats.
2.5.9.changes:
- Do not show crash dialogs for plugin bridges
- Fix build against latest liblo
- Fix crash showing plugin UIs in wayland
- Fix minimum width of CanvasPort labels
- Fix missing painter.restore() in case of CanvasPort errors
- Fix OSC unregister handling

1.0.0.name: Salamander Drumkit
1.0.0.author: Rytmenpinne
1.0.0.description: Drumkit recorded in the garage with an acoustic sound/feel.

1.7.0.name: DPF Plugins
1.7.0.author: Filipe Coelho
1.7.0.changes:
- Fix build with clang on non-macOS systems
- Fix CLAP plugins not saving state under Bitwig
- Fix Nekobi tuning parameter

0.2.0.name: Ninjas 2
0.2.0.author: Clearly Broken
0.2.0.description: Easy to use sample slicer, quick slicing of sample and auto-mapping slices to midi note numbers.
0.2.0.changes:
- Controls grouped by Global, Slicing and Slice
- Slice box shows the currently selected slice number
- Click on key to play slice
- Red dot to indicate currently selected slice
- Keys unmapped are greyed out

2.11.4.name: Chow Tape Model
2.11.4.author: Chowdhury DSP
2.11.4.description: Chow Tape Model is a digital emulation of a reel-to-reel analog tape machine. The original algorithm was developed to emulate the Sony TC-260, but has since been expanded to be able to model a wide variety of tape machines.
2.11.4.changes: - Fixed bug in Wow processing at high levels of "Depth".

1.3.0.name: CHOW Matrix
1.3.0.author: Chowdhury DSP
1.3.0.description: Delay effect, made up of an infinitely growable tree of delay lines, each with individual controls for feedback, panning, distortion, and more.
1.3.0.changes:
- iOS/AUv3 and Pro Tools/AAX support.
- Forwarding parameters to expose node parameters to DAWs.
- "Alien" and "Reverse" delay parameters.
- Optional automatic gain compensation for wet signal.
- Lock/unlock options for parameter randomisation.

3.1.0.name: JuicySFplugin
3.1.0.author: Birch San
3.1.0.description: SoundFont synthesizer for playing General Midi music using sf2 files.
3.1.0.changes:
- Updated fluidsynth to v2.2.5. Fixes sample looping bug.
- Updated JUCE to v6.1.5. Restores the native file picker and improves accessibility.
- Rewrote win32 cross-compile build system as a multi-stage Docker build

1.14.1.name: IEM Plugin Suite
1.14.1.author: Institute of Electronic Music and Acoustics
1.14.1.description: Collection of ambisonic plug-ins including Compressors, Delays, Reverb, Encoders, Decoders and Visualizers.
1.14.1.changes:
- Use JUCE 7.0.5 and support Windows Vista and 7
- AllRADecoder and SimpleDecoder
- Wrap azimuth exceeding 180¬∞ and elevation exceeding 90¬∞ for correct im-/export of layouts
- Update IEM Cube decoder preset and GranularEncoder

0.9.8.name: Dexed
0.9.8.author: Pascal Gauthier
0.9.8.description: Synthesizer closely modeled on the Yamaha DX7.
0.9.8.changes:
- Accessibility and UI component refresh
- Mono/Poly parameter plugin parameter
- Corrections of graphs for Algorithms 15 and 14
- Fixes for MidiMonitor and DexedTheme v2

0.2.0.name: Andes
0.2.0.author: Artem Popov
0.2.0.description: Andes is a software synthesiser plugin in early stages of development. The core of Andes is an original oscillator which uses a pseudo-3D version of Perlin noise to produce distinctively digital sound.
0.2.0.changes:
- Replaces XY modulation with Gradient offset and Warping parameters
- Uses Simplex noise instead of the classic Perlin noise for the oscillator

1.4.1.name: Scrollscope
1.4.1.author: Ardura
1.4.1.description: A simple scrolling oscilloscope in rust with multichannel inputs and an analyzer.

1.0.0.name: Interleaf
1.0.0.author: Ardura
1.0.0.description: A simple scrolling oscilloscope in rust with multichannel inputs and an analyzer.
1.0.0.changes: - New build files for better organization

1.0.0.name: Glade Desk
1.0.0.author: Ardura
1.0.0.description: Custom Console Idea.

1.3.5.name: Actuate
1.3.5.author: Ardura
1.3.5.description: A Subtractive and Additive Synthesizer, Sampler, and Granulizer built in Rust + Nih-Plug.
1.3.5.changes:
- Polyfilter update now works on additive, sampler, and granular sources
- Tilt filter was rewritten to have less crashes/bugs
- VCF Filter instability was fixed with some more safety and balancing changes
- New preset browser and format

0.1.1.name: ampli-Fe
0.1.1.author: Anton Lazarev
0.1.1.description: Amplifier effect which allows the volume to be changed from 0% to 200%.
0.1.1.changes:
- Updates wgpu dependency to fix graphics on some platforms
- Fixes a panic from click coordinate math

1.0.0.name: Airwindows
1.0.0.author: Chris Johnson
1.0.0.description: Huge collection of effects using simple UI controls.

1.2.2.name: Terrain
1.2.2.author: Aaron Anderson
1.2.2.changes:
- Add Tuning System Name, refreshed automatically
- Double-click default pitch-bend to 2 semitones
- Fix Slider->knob resizing issue
- Add MTS-ESP labeling
